Name: Final Attack
Desc:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage, prioritizing the Boss monster with the highest Max HP. Must have a Sword and Axe equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Weapon Mastery or above
Lv. 20 effect: Can learn the 4th Job Skill "Advanced Final Attack".

Desc.Old:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage. Must have a Sword and Axe equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Weapon Mastery or higher
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job Skill, Advanced Final Attack
Desc.New:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage, prioritizing the Boss monster with the highest Max HP. Must have a Sword and Axe equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Weapon Mastery or above
Lv. 20 effect: Can learn the 4th Job Skill "Advanced Final Attack".

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacks create a 40% chance of casting Final Attack that inflicts 150% damage.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] a 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 150% Damage
